alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene; Montgomery; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WARREN, NORTHWESTERN CLINTON, SOUTHERN GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Xenia, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Beavercreek, Xenia, Miamisburg, Springboro, Franklin, Bellbrook, Moraine, Oakwood, West Carrollton, Waynesville, Jamestown, Wilberforce, Riverside, New Jasper, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin and Bowersville. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 44 and 61. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 38 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
